name: Space Charger
description:
Solved: BUGS: Right now the only way to die is going into the sun.

Survive in space and don't get into the sun!

The game was made for the first edition of the Island Jam in Gran Canaria. 

The ship movement is based on physics.

Controls:

WASD: Impulse to that direction

Spacebar: Turbo

Left click: Shoot

Right click: Charge energy (while rechargin you can't control the ship)
